document.full_text: two climbers were killed and two others critically injured when the roped group fell at a pass high on mount mckinley, the national park service said on thursday.
document.title: two climbers die, two injured in mt mckinley fall
lines_and_colors: two climbers were killed and two others critically injured when the roped group fell at a pass high on mount mckinley, the national park service said on thursday.
